alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Geneva and northeastern Holmes Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 343 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonifay, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bonifay, Slocomb, Esto, Noma, Black, Miller Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Bethlehem, Holland Crossroads, Ards Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Noma Junction and Thurston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
